name: Yellow Flower
description:
Backstory: Yellow flower decided that the two of you are moving to a new corner of the meadow. It is pretty dry and there are plenty of beetles around with only one thing on their mind (flower dinner).

ControlsKeyMovingWASD
Shoot Water Droplets
Arrow Keys
Enter the Shop for Upgrades
Return Key
Restart Game
R

Hollywood-Produced Game-trailers:

PICKUP WATERDROPS (EVERY SINGLE WATERDROP is SIMULATED AND CAN BE PICKED UP!):


KILL your worst enemies (BEETLES!):

HELP your friend, the yellow plant by watering it when it is low on life:





AND if this all is not enough, ENTER the SHOP for buying UPGRADES that you could not have imagined!!

Thanks to https://soundcloud.com/loonmirage for making the great soundtrack and to my brother for helping with the graphics and doing some great gametesting.
